entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 8 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming southwest 20 after midnight. Temperature rising to minus 8 by morning. Wind chill minus 24 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. Temperature falling to minus 10 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h becoming light early in the afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 10 in the afternoon. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending after midnight then clearing. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h in the evening. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 18 in the evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 20 January 2023
